EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Transformation Council_SF_Q216.Invitation w/location & header - 4-2
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP for the Transformation Council in San Francisco May 11-May 12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal is pleased to be hosting another Transformation Council Meeting and Workshop led by Eric Ries, author of The Lean Startup and The Leader’s Guide. The event will be held in San Francisco on May 11–12 and we invite you to join us <[[http://pivotal.io/event/transformation-council/sanfrancisco]]>.
The Pivotal Transformation Council is an invite-only community for enterprise executives who are driving digital transformations within their organizations. The purpose of the council is to create a trusted forum where executives can come together regularly to learn, exchange ideas, and share their experiences with one another.
The event will kick-off with a private dinner with your peers at 6:30 pm on May 11th at Parallel 37 <[[http://www.ritzcarlton.com/en/hotels/california/san-francisco/dining/parallel-37]]>, followed by a half day of transformation talks and a workshop on May 12th.
Agenda
Wednesday, May 11: Private Dinner Location: Parallel 37 <[[http://www.ritzcarlton.com/en/hotels/california/san-francisco/dining/parallel-37]]>, 600 Stockton Street, San Francisco, CA 94108
6:30 pm–10:00 pm Networking and Socializing for Transformation Council members & attendees
Thursday, May 12: Transformation Talk & Workshop Location: The Pearl SF <[[http://thepearlsf.com/]]>, 601 19th St, San Francisco, CA 94107
8:00–8:30 am Breakfast
8:30–8:45 am Welcome remarks by Bill Cook and Edward Hieatt
8:45–9:45 am Trends in transformation, what companies can do to accelerate moving from the past to the future and how to break things down to MVP—how to “get small”
9:45–10:00 am Break
10:00–11:15 am Acceleration Workshop
11:15–11:45 am Standups (Let’s share what we’ve learned)
11:45am–12:00 pm Closing remarks
12:00 pm Lunch Served (Boxed lunch provided for those traveling)
Space is limited so please RSVP <[[http://pivotal.io/event/transformation-council/sanfrancisco]]>.
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Transformation Team
